events.message: I have just been involved in a car accident and need to file a claim immediately for the damages caused to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the report provided by the customer regarding the vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will contact the claimant to proceed with the next steps in the assessment process.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and appreciate your promptness in reporting the incident.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driverâ€™s license to support the car accident claim.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including the police report and photographs detailing the collision impact.
Our investigation team has started reviewing the evidence to determine the extent of damages and liability for the vehicle accident.
The investigation into the auto accident has been completed, with findings confirming the details submitted by the claimant.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment for repairs to the vehicle caused by the collision.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication throughout the claim process.
The claim has been formally approved, authorizing the payment to cover the necessary vehicle repairs from the accident.
Payment has been issued to the claimant to cover the repair costs of the auto accident damage as per the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim is now officially closed following the settlement payment and confirmation of repair completion.
